text: Halesworth railway station is a station in Suffolk, England for Halesworth. Trains are currently run by Greater Anglia. ==Trains== Company Line Train Type Times Notes Greater Anglia (Harwich International -) Ipswich - Westerfield - Woodbridge - Melton - Wickham Market - Saxmundham - Darsham - Halesworth - Brampton - Beccles - Oulton Broad South - Lowestoft Class 170 Every 2 Hours Service to Harwich 1x per day Category:Railway stations in Suffolk
title: Halesworth railway station
